protein.specific_function: May function as a thiol-disulfide oxidoreductase that participates in disulfide bond formation

reference.reference_text: Korotkov KV, Novoselov SV, Hatfield DL, Gladyshev VN: Mammalian selenoprotein in which selenocysteine (Sec) incorporation is supported by a new form of Sec insertion sequence element. Mol Cell Biol. 2002 Mar;22(5):1402-11.
